description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. 1 year after Moe Mekuri 2, new Moe Mekuri 3 is here with all new cute girls! The game system is the same puzzle game as the previous version. Can you pass all the stages and get all the illustrations of those girls in your gallery? Enjoy this moe-moe puzzle game that once you start, you can't stop
description.short: 1 year after Moe Mekuri 2, new Moe Mekuri 3 is here with all new cute girls! The game system is the same puzzle game as the previous version. Can you pass all the stages and get all the illustrations of those girls in your gallery? Enjoy this moe-moe puzzle game that once you start, you can't stop
